ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | unitinvcl.1 | |- U = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 2 |  | unitinvcl.2 | |- I = ( invr ` R ) |
| 3 |  | ringinvcl.3 | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_unitinvcl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. U ) -> ( I ` X ) e. U ) |
| 5 | 3, 1 | #P_unitcl | |- ( ( I ` X ) e. U -> ( I ` X ) e. B ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. U ) -> ( I ` X ) e. B ) |
